name: American Cancer Society: Discovery Shop (Oakland)
description: Thrift store accepting donations; proceeds support cancer research and patient programs
fullDescription: The American Cancer Society Discovery Shop in Oakland is a thrift store selling quality secondhand and vintage items, with proceeds supporting cancer research and patient programs.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing donations
- Accept accessories and housewares
- Accept linens and furniture
- Accept collectibles and vintage items
- Affordable thrift shopping
- Proceeds fund cancer research
howToGetIt:
1. Visit the Discovery Shop at 127 41st St, Oakland
2. Donate gently used items
3. Or shop for affordable goods
4. Open Mon-Sun 10am-5pm
5. All purchases benefit ACS programs
